name: A Weekend in Vegas
description:
Title: A Weekend in Vegas 

Platform: Web Browser

Genre: Text Adventure 

Rating: T 

Target Market: Teenagers/ College Kids/ Adults 

Game Overview: This is a text adventure game that gives you the option to make your own decisions about a night out in Vegas. 

Instructions: Open the link and play in browser, select one of the highlighted options to continue with the story. 

Game Design Team: Braden Lavarnway – Game Designer
